pages.text: $(li)The Wildifre Helmet has Armour Toughness giving you extra protection from strong attacks.$(br)$(li)It gives to you the Fire Resistance effect when you are wearing it too, making you totally immune to Fire damage.

pages.name: Wildfire Helmet
pages.text: It can only be obtained slaying $(l:patchouli:creatures/outvoted/wildfire)Wildfires$(/l).
